thread.section_title: Hoselink Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Hoselink | hoselink.com.au
thread.title: Mervyn Voigt

author: Mervyn Voigt
title: Mervyn Voigt
text: I ordered the 30 meter hose reel. My order was processed promptly order was despatched and on it's way. In 4 days it arrived. I would say this would be the best company I've dealt with online. A previous order with the company was also dealt with very efficiently. I would recommend this company hoselink to everyone for all your watering needs. And the leakproof fittings are100% the best i have used or seen.
